name: Dungeon Bosses
description:
The brother of the main character accidentally falls into the dungeon and the protagonist has to go to the rescue.
At the beginning of the game, you can learn a little plot that would have a small idea, but the ending of the game will depend only you, whether it is good or bad end. The game has 13 bosses and they need to go through, pumping your character, that would eventually release the brother of the protagonist.

Features:
  13 bosses
  Various items for leveling

  Getting statuettes when the necessary conditions

  Interesting story
